game_description: THE AWARD WINNING MULTI-TASKING SHOOTER ‚ÄúA fun shooter with a twist‚Äù 8/10 THE SIXTH AXIS ‚Äúan experience that should be in the top tier of VR games‚Äù 9/10 GAMING NEXUS "Silly, funny, demanding and absolutely unique" PSVR WITHOUT PAROLE ‚Äúas much fun for the VR fanatic as it is for the casual player‚Äù 8/10 GAMING TREND "Definitely a hidden gem" NATHIE Do your job whilst shooting guns! Shooty Fruity combines job simulation with exhilarating combat that makes you feel like a true action hero - whether McClane, Wick or Rambo. Take on new roles and unlock weapons to fight your way through your career. Scan shoot repeat! SHOOTER MEETS JOB SIM Frantic multi-tasking gameplay only possible in VR EXHILARATING COMBAT Shoot hordes of enemies with an expanding array of guns HIGH OCTANE ARSENAL Including flak cannons, gatling guns & missile launchers POWER UP Wield bullet-time slow-mo, exploding ammo & more YOUR NEW CAREER Scan, serve & pack across countless missions to rise the leaderboards
Languages: English, French (France), German, Italian, Japanese, Russian, Spanish (Spain)
review_1: This game is a blast. I was surprised by how much I enjoyed it. Somehow, scanning groceries and targeting fruit uses different parts of my brain, so it's a challenge that also makes me laugh. The levels are fun, and the loudspeaker announcements are hilarious. The only complaint I have is that there doesn't seem to be a way to play this game while seated (everything is too low--below lap level). That means it's not accessible to certain players, which is unfortunate. Please either make (or fix) the seated scale gameplay so that those confined to wheelchairs can also play.

review_4: I love Shooty Fruity. Finally a shooter that's funny because you shoot at fruits and not at people. It's awesome that you also have to find the balance to scan the goods. And every round is just fun! With the juice won you can unlock new weapons. The game is just great!
